ROS Chat - A Platform for Live Video Interactions

Brief: ROS Chat is a vibrant platform designed to connect people through live video chat, allowing users to engage in real-time video interactions. As a means to communicate, network, and share experiences, ROS Chat brings individuals together from various backgrounds to converse and collaborate visually.
